title: 1.DOCTYPE html
description: this is not a tag it is an information to the browser about what document type to expect

title: 2.html:
description: this tag represents the root of html document and container for all other element expcept !DOCTYPE

title: 3.head
description: this is a container for metadata (data about data ). Metadata is data aboout the html document and never displayed its typically define the document title, charecter set, styles,scripts and other meta information

title: 4.title
description: defines the title of the document

title: 5.style
description: defines style information (CSS) for document

title: 6.base
description: specifies the base url/target

title: 7.link
description: defines the relationship between the current document and an external resource it is most often used to link to external style sheets or to add a favicon to a website

title: 8.meta
description: defines metadata about an html document which go inside tha heal element, and are typically used to specify charecter set, page description, keywords, author of document, and viewport. it used in browsers (how to display content or reload page), search engines (keywords), and other web services. there is a method let web designers take control over the viewport (the user's visible area of a webpage ), through the meta tag

title: 9.script
description: used to embed a client side script (javascript) the element either contains scripting statements, or it points to an external script file through the src attribut.

title: 10.noscript
description: defines an alternate content to be displayed to user that have displayed scripts in their browser or have a browser that doesn't support script

title: 11.body
description: defines the document's body and contains all the contents of an html document

title: 12.a
description: defines a hyperling, which is used to link from one page to another

title: 13.p
description: defines a pragraph add a single blank line before and after each

title: 14.q
description: defines short quation with quation mark

title: 15.s
description: specifies text that is no longer correct

title: 16.span
description: an inline container used to mark up a part of a text, or a part of document

title: 18.template
description: used as a container to hold some html content hidden from the user when the page loads an its content can be rendered later with a javascript

title: 19.var
description: used to defines a variable in programming or in a mathematical expression.the content inside is typically displayed in italic

title: 20.time
description: defines a specific time(or datetime). this element is used translate the time into a machine-readable format so the user's calendar, and search engines can produce smarter search results

title: 21.strong
description: defines important text

title: 22.select
description: is used to create drop-down list. this is most often used in a form, to collect user input

title: 23.sub
description: defines subscript text like H<sub>2</sub>O

title: 24.sup
description: defines superscripted text like A <sup>2</sup>

title: 25.u
description: defines some text that is unarticulated and styled differently from normal text, such as mispelled words or proper names in Chinese text
